General.Name: Hunan Chen Dian International Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Chendian International Development co.,ltd engages in the power supply, water supply, and industrial gas production businesses primarily in China. The company also engages in investment, development, and management of hydropower stations; and production, transportation, and sale of industrial oxygen to large and medium-sized steel enterprises. In addition, it provides urban and rural sewage treatment services; hotel services; new energy and integrated energy services; offers electrical equipment; and engages in generation of coke oven gas power. Hunan Chendian International Development co.,ltd was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Chenzhou, China.
